Npc1373:
ï¿½Good morn...[PAUSE 10]  Uhhh... not morning.[PAUSE 10][WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Here[PAUSE 5] in Moonside, it's always the middle of the night.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½This is a headline from tonight's Moonside Press...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½ï¿½Mani Mani is [PAUSE 10] always Mani Mani [PAUSE 10] at Mani Mani with all [PAUSE 10] Mani Mani [PAUSE 10] Maniï¿½[HALT][END]
